mapper.insert: insert into online_exam.exam_rule(Id, rule_Name, exam_Id, cou_Id, totalMark, difficulty, singleNum, singleScore, completeNum, completeScore, subjectNum, subjectScore, pointIds, rule_Time) VALUES (#{Id},#{rule_Name},#{exam_Id},#{cou_Id},#{totalMark},#{difficulty},#{singleNum},#{singleScore},#{completeNum},#{completeScore},#{subjectNum},#{subjectScore},#{pointIds},#{rule_Time});
